ValidationRule.description: Requires FTB Number field if the Type is Market Alert
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Type , "Market Alert"), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Closed"), ISBLANK( FTB_Number__c ), OR( RecordType.Name = "EDI Order", RecordType.Name = "Inquiry", RecordType.Name = "Inquiry (Internal)", RecordType.Name = "Order Claim", RecordType.Name = "Orders", RecordType.Name = "Quality Claim", RecordType.Name = "Third Party", RecordType.Name = "Changes" ) )
